title: Online Community Manager – WFH (PHP 25K – 40K!)
job_overview:
Manage Social Media Groups & Earn Big! No Experience? OK!

Love Social Media groups? We need an Online Community Manager to engage members & grow our pages—work from home, flexible hours!

? What You’ll Do:

Post updates, reply to comments, moderate discussions

Basic social media marketing (we train you!)

Must be online 5 mins every 20 mins

???? PHP 25,000 – 40,000/month + bonuses!
???? Perfect for social media lovers!
Apply now—limited openings!
